name: retry
signature: { <E, R2, X>(policy: Schedule<X, NoInfer<E>, R2>): <A, R>(self: Stream<A, E, R>) => Stream<A, E, R2 | R>; <A, E, R, X, R2>(self: Stream<A, E, R>, policy: Schedule<X, NoInfer<E>, R2>): Stream<A, E, R | R2>; }
description:
When the stream fails, retry it according to the given schedule This retries the entire stream, so will re-execute all of the stream's
acquire operations. The schedule is reset as soon as the first element passes through the
stream again.
documentation:
When the stream fails, retry it according to the given schedule

This retries the entire stream, so will re-execute all of the stream's
acquire operations.

The schedule is reset as soon as the first element passes through the
stream again.
